wikipedia_page.main: Jordan Tyler Simpson (born 28 November 1998) is an English professional footballer who plays for Ashton United as a midfielder.

response: Jordan Simpson (born 28 August 1985) is an Australian footballer who plays as a central midfielder for National Premier Leagues NSW 2 club Fraser Park FC.

On 9 March 2017, Twine signed his first professional deal with Swindon Town along with team-mates Tommy Ouldridge and Jordan Simpson. After appearing on the bench several times, Twine finally made his Swindon debut on the final day of the 2016–17 campaign. Replacing Islam Feruz in the 69th minute during Swindon's 3–0 away defeat against Charlton Athletic.
